alert.note: Alert for Baker County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 1:07PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Baker County through 145 PM PDT... At 107 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Haines, or near North Powder, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Haines around 110 PM PDT. Baker City and Flagstaff Hill around 140 PM PDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
